summary: VW JETTA GLS.  BOTTOM IS FIRST DATE OF PROBLEM. EXCESSIVE FUEL BURNING AND ALARM/LIGHT WENT ON AT 8,000 MILES - RESULTED IN BLOWN HEAD GASKET @37,000 AND CHECK ENGINE LIGHT CONTINUOUSLY ON. VW DENIES THAT EVEN THOUGH IT WAS SERVICED FOR THE SAME PROBLEM SO MANY TIMES, THE VEHICLE WAS NOT IMPAIRED.  *JB
